plot: A much picked upon teenager (Robinson) helps his uncle adjust to life in a swank retirement resort. Believing he's escaped the drudgery of teenage life, he soon finds his dreams dashed when set upon by a septuagenarian bully (Rocco).
title: Restive Planet
plot_es: A much picked upon teenager (Robinson) helps his uncle adjust to life in a swank retirement resort. Believing he's escaped the drudgery of teenage life, he soon finds his dreams dashed when set upon by a septuagenarian bully (Rocco).
